content.question: Which of the following most clearly demonstrates social learning theory?

choices.label: Mavis learns a line dance by watching her friends perform it.
Neville becomes dependent on alcohol because he finds that after drinking it he temporarily forgets his problems.
After writing his paper at the last minute, Raul gets a bad grade and never procrastinates again.
Xanthe deletes his social media accounts after experiencing harsh bullying from others online.

content.answer: Mavis learns a line dance by watching her friends perform it.
